pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Hypothesis Tests // Multivariate hypothesis tests and the confidence intervals. This package can be used for hypothesis tests which are The Hotelling T Square Tests (One- Sample, Two Independent Samples, Paired Samples), The One Way MANOVA,The Multivariate Shapiro-Wilk Test for Multivariate Normality Test, The Bartlett Test for One Sample Covariance Matrix, The Box-M Test and The Bartlett's Sphericity Test. For this package, we have benefited the studies Rencher (2003), Nel and Merwe (1986) DOI: 10.1080/03610928608829342, Tatlidil (1996), James (1994) DOI: 10.2307/2333003, Tsagris (2014), Villasenor Alva and Estrada (2009) DOI: 10.1080/03610920802474465.
